name: Avoid use of *NOMAX  (CL400)
description: This rule searaches for CL400 programs using the *NOMAX clause.
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: This attibute must be avoided. It can lead to situations in which programs put information into files without space constraints. As a consequence, all the available space can be used and the system can be destabilized.
remediation: Specify the value or threshold explicitely.
remediationSample:
Remediation for Sample source :
   PGM 
   chgprtf qpsrodsp maxrcds(100000)
   ENDPGM.
sample:
PGM 
   chgprtf qpsrodsp maxrcds(*nomax) //Quality Rule Violation
   ENDPGM.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
